title: Standard error of proportion playing varsity sport

content.prompt: In a large school district, 16 of 85 randomly selected high school seniors play a varsity sport. In the same district, 19 of 67 randomly selected high school juniors play a varsity sport. A 95 percent confidence interval for the difference between the proportion of high school seniors who play a varsity sport in the school district and high school juniors who play a varsity sport in the school district is to be calculated. What is the standard error of the difference?

topic.text: 5.6: Sampling Distributions for Differences in Sample Proportions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
